EmailTemplate.description: When Employee Rise the Request Hr will get Request Email
EmailTemplate.name: EMS_EM_Req_Hr
EmailTemplate.subject: New Request Raised
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!EMS_EM_Request__c.Approver__c},
{!EMS_EM_Request__c.Contact__c} has raised a request to change his {!EMS_EM_Request__c.EMS_EM_Request_Type__c}. Click {!EMS_EM_Request__c.Link} to view the request.
